question: "Ek Sadak Ek Prajati" scheme was launched by which of the following states of India?
explanation: "Ek Sadak Ek Prajati" scheme was launched by the state of Uttar Pradesh. As per the scheme, Each road will have the same kind of tree species. The Department of Urban Development will responsible for planting saplings and the overall scheme will be supervised by the forest department.
